entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
